means: 不快乐的，沉闷的，忧郁的

sentence.Network_en: He was falsely jovial, with his booming, mirthless laugh.
sentence.Network_cn: 他低声苦笑了几声，装出快乐的样子。

sentence.Network_en: He permitted himself a small mirthless smile.
His mouth corners curved in his highly individual, cold, almost mirthless smile.
sentence.Network_cn: 他嘴角一抿, 露出极为独特的, 几乎是闷闷不乐的淡笑.

mindless不快乐的mirthless没有灰泥的motionless不动的

RelatedPhrase.word: I will weep when I am mirthless too

list.key: I will weep when I am mirthless too
list.abs: 我步履蹒跚地走在落叶飘然的树底,I stagger under the falling leaves trees,...心碎我也会落泪。I will weep when I am mirthless too.  因为我已落进了.
His mirthless smile made all of us uncomfortable ., 他生硬的笑使我们感到很不舒服.
know me , your mirthless day has already walked to the end , wait for you will be a happiness , happiness .认识我，你不快乐的日子已经走到了尽头，等待你的将是快乐，幸福。
His mirthless smile made all of us uncomfortable ., 他生硬的笑使我们感到很不舒服.

entry.def: If someone gives a mirthless laugh or smile, it is obvious that they are not really amused.

example.ex: He permitted himself a small mirthless smile.

auth_sentence.content: His mirthless grin isn't fixed, but the lipstick smear of a crazy street lady.

auth_sentence.content: Erdmann, recounting the story two weeks later in his trailer behind the palace, smiled in his mirthless way.

auth_sentence.content: Working from a script by Michael Gerbosi, Schrader jumps through vignettes of mirthless fun and bland debauchery.
